_comment: File is auto-generated, do not edit it manually.

zero.comment: Use to set a media query `min-width` below small.

sm.comment: The `min-width` for mobile devices, such as phones and tablets.

xl.comment: Used for extra large screens, such as wide monitors and TVs.

5.comment: Banners, Snackbars, Toast Messages, Non modal Dialogs, ; Side Panels (when opacity overlay behaviour is not applied)

6.comment: Modal Dialogs, Side Panels (when opacity overlay behaviour; is applied)

zero.comment: Full-width and background containers. Fixed navigation containers such as headers, and side-panels.

xs.comment: Use this for subtle and smaller elements that don't contain complex information. Often high-density components. Checkbox, Pill

sm.comment: Components presenting info text, user input, user feedback. Inputs, Toasts, Snack bars, Tooltips, Error Alert Banner

md.comment: Core large containers, card containers and popups that house moderate amounts of content and/or data: Card, Menus

lg.comment: Primarily used for elevated and simple parent containers with greater amounts of content and UI. Dialogs, Modals, Bottom Sheets

full.comment: Full rounding is reserved high-visibility components. This shape is intended to draw attention. Buttons, Badge, Status Indicator, Essential Inputs, Border Containers (Not Cards)

sm.comment: X-Small Buttons, Pills, Checkboxes, Radio Buttons

md.comment: Small Buttons, Segmented Control, Tooltip, Avatar

lg.comment: Default height for most components, like Medium Buttons, Segmented Control, Banner, Input Fields, and Menu List Items

xl.comment: Large size used in Large Buttons, Segmented Controls, Expandable Container Trigger, Tabs, and Avatar

none.comment: Use when there should be no space between content and element's edges.

sm.comment: Compact padding, used in Rich Text Editor, or X-Small Buttons

md.comment: Default padding used for components used around Small Button content.

lg.comment: Large padding, used in Medium Buttons with Icons

xl.comment: Padding used around Card and Medium Button content

xxl.comment: Padding used around Modal and Large Button content

none.comment: Use when there is no space between elements

xs.comment: Compact spacing from icon to text, labels to inputs, between tab items.

sm.comment: Horizontal space between pills, tighter space between buttons, inline icon to text, segmented controls.

md.comment: Use the default inline spacing when other gap tokens may not fit.

lg.comment: Use this for tighter spacing between cards. Cards are self contained blocks of content.

xl.comment: Use this for the default spacing between cards, as well as the gutter width used in the large 12-column grid.

xxl.comment: Use this for the space between content sections

stronger.comment: Active state for segmented control, Pill
